plot: Mlle Lara has trouble with men so for her birthday she plans something special in pursuit of a wonderful love.
title: Quand on est amoureux c'est merveilleux
plot_es: Mlle Lara has trouble with men so for her birthday she plans something special in pursuit of a wonderful love.
original_name: Quand on est amoureux c'est merveilleux
plot_en: Mlle Lara has trouble with men so for her birthday she plans something special in pursuit of a wonderful love.
